title: How Many Calories in a Cheese Quesadilla?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in a cheese quesadilla, including full nutrition breakdown, macros, and easy tweaks for variations.
h1: How Many Calories in a Cheese Quesadilla?
assumptions: 8-inch flour tortilla with 1/2 cup shredded cheddar cheese, folded and cooked on a dry skillet; no added oil, meats, or toppings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by tortilla size, cheese type/amount, brand, and cooking method. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: A standard cheese quesadilla contains about 450 kcal, with 18 g protein and 25 g fat.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in a basic cheese quesadilla?
faqs.a: Approximately 450 kcal for one standard 8-inch version.

faqs.q: What are the macros for a cheese quesadilla?
faqs.a: About 40 g carbs, 18 g protein, 25 g fat, including 12 g saturated fat.

faqs.q: Does adding oil increase calories in a quesadilla?
faqs.a: Yes, 1 tsp oil adds ~40 kcal; dry cooking keeps it lower.

faqs.q: How much sodium is in a cheese quesadilla?
faqs.a: Around 800 mg, mostly from cheese and tortilla.

faqs.q: Can I make a lower-calorie cheese quesadilla?
faqs.a: Opt for low-fat cheese or smaller tortilla to reduce by 50-100 kcal.
